page.title: 10A camp diary cont.
page.content: .... Yarmouth C.E. Primary School for our dinner. We had cabbage, potatoes and casserole. For pudding we had sponge with sugar strands on top. We also had strawberry flavoured milk shake. In the afternoon we climbed the tower of St.Jame's Church Yarmouth. We could see for miles around in every direction because it was a bright sunny day. We could see the countryside we were going to explore and study. Halfway up the tower some children went down but i kept going up. We came to the bit that worked the clock. When I reached the top I didn't like it much so I went down. In the morning we went to Brighstone Down car-park and from there went for a 6 mile walk over the downs from the top of which we could see the whole ..
